abstract: Our paper will cover both academic and technical development of the Graves Diary Project (1935-39)url. This project and this paper have been made possible by close collaboration between the editors and the programming staff at the University of Victoria Humanities Computing Centre.
article_title: Pedagogy in the Electronic English Classroom: A Cluster
keywords: Electronic text, TEI corpus, XML database, eXist, XPath, JavaScript, Laura Riding, expatriate English writers, Spanish Civil War
